Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back FREE COACH TRANSFER FREE PORT PARKING Tilbury, London Arctic Explorer & Northern Lights 13 Night Cruise FREE CHAMPAGNE Overview Inclusions Cabin Types Terms & Conditions Spend two glorious weeks sailing to Norway’s most beautiful towns and cities. Home to Norway’s first-ever king, you’ll become enthralled by Haugesund’s Viking heritage before sailing to the artistic city of Bergen and onto Alesund, rated the most beautiful city in Norway. You’ll hopefully catch a glimpse of the Northern Lights when visiting Trondheim and Tromso, due to their location on the Aurora Oval. Sailing north of the Arctic Circle takes you to Alta, Tromso, Bodo and brings us to Leknes where you’ll find stunning crystal-clear waters, before arriving at Bodo and returning home via Aberdeen. View more View less 13 Night Cruise from $ 2675 per person share twin Inside Stateroom Flights Additional Cruising with Ambassador Cruise Line FREE COACH TRANSFER FREE PORT PARKING Sale Period : until 30 Nov 25 or unless sold out Departs 22 Mar 26 | Sailing from Tilbury, London HOT Cruise deal Includes 13 night cruise onboard Ambition Ambassador Cruise Included in all bookings All port taxes, fees and charges Porterage of luggage between the port and cabin Spa access Use of gym, swimming pool and hot tubs Range of fitness, dance and wellness classes Amazing entertainment Informative guest speakers* Captain’s Gala Dinner and Baked Alaska Parade* Comfortable accommodation in chosen cabin category Flexible cancellation policies† Captain’s cocktail party* Exceptional full board cuisine Cruise Itinerary Day 1 - London Tilbury 22 Mar 26 Departs: 1600 London Tilbury, a key entry point to the UK capital, is nestled along the River Thames in Essex. Discover waterfront attractions like Tilbury Fort, which offers a window into the rich maritime history of this quintessential port town on the Thames Estuary. Day 2 - At Sea 23 Mar 26 Sea days are the perfect opportunity to explore the ship, relax and unwind and spend quality time with those around you. Whether you pamper yourself in the Green Sea Spa, experience all the outstanding cuisine we have onboard, enjoy our amazing entertainment in the Palladium and other venues, attend a class or talk or play games with friends or family, there's something for everyone. Day 3 - At Sea 23 Mar 26 Sea days are the perfect opportunity to explore the ship, relax and unwind and spend quality time with those around you. Whether you pamper yourself in the Green Sea Spa, experience all the outstanding cuisine we have onboard, enjoy our amazing entertainment in the Palladium and other venues, attend a class or talk or play games with friends or family, there's something for everyone. Day 4 - Bodo 25 Mar 26 Arrives: 1330 Departs: 0100 Bodo, Norway offers a gateway to Arctic wonders. Enjoy sweeping mountain vistas, dramatic fjords, and cosy fishing villages tucked along the beautiful Lofoten archipelago. Day 5 - Leknes, Lofoten Islands 26 Mar 26 Arrives: 0800 Departs: 2000 Designated as a town as recently as 2002, little Leknes is a hidden gem of Norway's Lofoten Islands. Dramatic mountain landscapes and rugged beaches abound in a place that is renowned for its pristine beauty. Day 6 - At Sea 27 Mar 26 Sea days are the perfect opportunity to explore the ship, relax and unwind and spend quality time with those around you. Whether you pamper yourself in the Green Sea Spa, experience all the outstanding cuisine we have onboard, enjoy our amazing entertainment in the Palladium and other venues, attend a class or talk or play games with friends or family, there's something for everyone. Day 7 - Tromso 28 Mar 26 Arrives: 0800 Departs: 2000 Situated within the Arctic Circle, Tromso was once the historic starting point for many Arctic expeditions. The city offers visitors the opportunity to witness the spectacular Northern Lights as well as enjoy a rich cultural scene, vibrant festivals, and stunning fjord landscapes. Day 8 - Alta 29 Mar 26 Arrives: 1200 In Norway's far north, Alta invites exploration amidst the Arctic wilderness. Must-see attractions include the captivating Northern Lights and the prehistoric Rock Art of Alta, Norway's only UNESCO World Heritage Site. Day 9 - Alta 30 Mar 26 Departs: 1800 In Norway's far north, Alta invites exploration amidst the Arctic wilderness. Must-see attractions include the captivating Northern Lights and the prehistoric Rock Art of Alta, Norway's only UNESCO World Heritage Site. Day 10 - At Sea 31 Mar 26 Sea days are the perfect opportunity to explore the ship, relax and unwind and spend quality time with those around you. Whether you pamper yourself in the Green Sea Spa, experience all the outstanding cuisine we have onboard, enjoy our amazing entertainment in the Palladium and other venues, attend a class or talk or play games with friends or family, there's something for everyone. Day 11 - Alesund 01 Apr 26 Arrives: 0800 Departs: 1400 Picture-perfect Alesund, Norway captivates with its Art Nouveau architecture and fjord vistas. Explore the historic centre, ascend Aksla viewpoint for panoramic views, and savour fresh seafood at the fish market. Day 12 - At sea 02 Apr 26 Sea days are the perfect opportunity to explore the ship, relax and unwind and spend quality time with those around you. Whether you pamper yourself in the Green Sea Spa, experience all the outstanding cuisine we have onboard, enjoy our amazing entertainment in the Palladium and other venues, attend a class or talk or play games with friends or family, there's something for everyone. Day 13 - At Sea 03 Apr 26 Sea days are the perfect opportunity to explore the ship, relax and unwind and spend quality time with those around you. Whether you pamper yourself in the Green Sea Spa, experience all the outstanding cuisine we have onboard, enjoy our amazing entertainment in the Palladium and other venues, attend a class or talk or play games with friends or family, there's something for everyone. Day 14 - London Tilbury 04 Apr 26 Arrives: 0800 London Tilbury, a key entry point to the UK capital, is nestled along the River Thames in Essex. Discover waterfront attractions like Tilbury Fort, which offers a window into the rich maritime history of this quintessential port town on the Thames Estuary. Cabin Types Departs From London (Tilbury), England from Auckland Inside Stateroom Welcome to the cozy comfort of an Inside Cabin. Relax in your private space, complete with all the amenities you need for a memorable voyage. This cabin type features two twin beds that are easily convertible to a double bed for flexibility. Some cabins also include a third and/or fourth upper berth that is perfect for families or groups. London (Tilbury), England Cruise from $2219 per person share twin Free Champagne^^ Offer ends 31 Oct 25 Free Port Parking and Coach Transfer^ -Offer ends 12 Nov 25 Travel 22 Mar - 04 Apr 26 Stateroom images and features are samples only. Actual furniture, fixtures, colors, configurations and window/porthole views may vary. Terms & Conditions All cruise packages are based on Twin share, inside cabin and costs are per person. All prices are converted from British Pounds and are subject to currency fluctuation at time of booking. Availability is current as at 30 Oct25 and deals are available until date shown or until sold out. Space is strictly limited and is subject to availability at time of booking. On board credit where shown is per cabin & must be spent on board and is not refundable in cash. All passengers are bound by the individual cruise lines terms & conditions, please ask your consultant for a full copy. Current Deals must be paid in full at time of booking or deposit dates as shown. All passengers must have a valid passport with more than 6 months validity at the end of their holiday. Travel insurance should be taken out at time of booking to cover in the event of any unforeseen cancellation. Included airfares are based on special non refundable economy fares, ground transfers are not included unless specified, any hotels included are on a room only basis unless specified. Hotels in certain destinations in Europe, USA and Asia may require local tourist taxes or resort fees payable at check in, We aim to give an indication of these where possible, but unfortunately you cannot pre pay this aspect of the hotel rate and must settle at check in. ESTA Visas are required for Itineraries visiting USA ,Canada, India, China, Vietnam, Schengen states & Sri Lanka. Visa costs are not included. Passports must be valid at least 6 months after the end of your holiday, If travelling on a non NZ passport other visas + NZ re-entry permits may also be required, please check with applicable embassy. Passport validity, Visas, Vaccinations and health requirements are the responsibility of the passengers. Individual cruise line T&C will apply based on the cruise line booked Ambassador Cruise T&C's: *Informative guest speakers Available on cruises of 6 nights or more *Captain’s Gala Dinner and Baked Alaska Parade Available on cruises of 6 nights or more *Captain’s cocktail party* Available on cruises of 6 nights or more *Flexible cancellation policies† †In the event of your cruise being cancelled, you will be guaranteed a full refund. Free Champagne T&C's: ^^The promotional code BUBBLES can be combined with other charity/member/association/media/affiliate promotion codes and onboard future cruise offers. It can be combined with an Ambassador Campaign Promotional code advertised on the Ambassador website. The promotional code is not valid on Ambassador’s Festive Events, selected charters and cannot be used over Ambassador’s Black Friday promotional period. The promotional code can only be used for new bookings only made directly on Ambassador’s website or through our call centre, it can be used for bookings made through travel agents and other third parties. The promotional code is valid on all new bookings from 29 September 2025 to 31 October 2025, closing at 23.59 for all seasons on sale on the Ambassador website, each cabin will receive one bottle of Champagne per cabin per sailing. The promotional code must be entered at the time of booking to be valid. It cannot be applied retrospectively to existing bookings, even if the booking was made during the promotional period. Free Port Parking or Coach Transfer T&C's: ^Fares subject to availability and may be withdrawn or changed without notice. Free car parking or return Victoria coach is valid on new bookings only on specific sailings from 08:00 13th October 2025 until 23:59, 12th November 2025 inclusive on selected 2025/2026/2027/2028 season sailings. Offer is valid for up to two adults paying the Saver or Ambassador fare, 3rd/4th berth are not eligible for free car parking or return Victoria coach. Car Parking can be reserved by either guest booked in the cabin, and they must be over the age of 18. Free car parking is for one car per cabin booked only, free return Victoria coach is for both guests booked in the cabin. Solo travellers will get free car parking or return Victoria coach booking the Saver or Ambassador fare over the same period on selected 2025/2026/2027/2028 season sailings. All offers are capacity controlled and subject to availability and may be withdrawn without notice at any time. Please note this promotion is not applicable to any festive/in port events, charters, Fly cruises or any booking made outside of the promotional dates. Extras not included: Travel insurance, travel costs to/from the port of embarkation, port parking, onboard gratuities and service charges where a package has not been purchased (automatically billed to the onboard account), optional shore excursions, discretionary expenditure of a personal nature including hot and cold alcoholic & non-alcoholic drinks, gifts, shopping, laundry, WIFI & communication, and any visa & health certificate charges that may apply. Ambassador Cruise Line reserves the right to cancel, change or amend any theme cruise activities/speakers/acts at short notice. In the event of your cruise being cancelled, you will be guaranteed a full refund. Cruise holidays booked with Ambassador Cruise Holidays Limited, trading as Ambassador Cruise Line, are financially protected in accordance with the Package Travel and Linked Arrangements Regulations 2018. from $ 2675 per person share twin Inside Stateroom Flights Additional Enquire now Close options Enquire now Call: 0800 713 715 Book a video call Cruise Arctic Explorer & Northern Lights Tilbury, London Enquire now Call: 0800 713 715 Book a video call Quick links Cruises Deals Destinations Flights Holidays Online Brochures Stores & Consultants About HOT Why HOT Careers Email Sign Up Gift Cards Travel insurance Video Appointments Media Centre Help & Support Contact us Help and Support Payment Options Privacy Policy T&Cs - Instore Bookings T&C’s - Online Flight Bookings Website Usage © House of Travel 2004-2024 The House of Travel App Want the insider word on all things travel?
